Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Removes the requirement for in person attendance at public meetings by community boards in N.Y. city
Summary: Enacts the "access for all act" removing the requirement for in person attendance at public meetings by community boards in a city with a population of over one million.
LawCode: Amd ยง103-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to removing the requirement for in person attendance at public meetings by certain community boards
